- kamkaru amathi gamini lokugesunil daya alwisjiwithaye sada samayedi, asarana nowi kisiwakuta atha nopa kisiyam mudalak masikawa labadime yahapath chethanawa peradari karagena paudgalika anshaye sewakayanta wishrama watup kramaya rajaya sakas kara athayi kamkaru amathi gamini lokuge mahatha pawasayi.meyin sewakayange sewaka artha sadhakayata sewa niyukthikayange bharakara aramudalata ho parithoshikayata kisidu balapamak sidu nowana bawath me sambandhayen pathira yana boho pracharawala kisidu sathyathawayak nathayi da amathiwaraya kiya.parlimenthuwata mema panatha sammatha kirimata pera api thawaduratath wiwidha kandayam, wruththiya samithi kamkaru upadeshaka sabhawa shri lanka maha bankuwa ha mudal amathyanshaye lekamwaraya aadi adala ansha samanga da sakachcha karannatath awashya sanshodhana thibe nam ee sandaha da sudanam yayi da amathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya.amathiwaraya me karunu anawaranaya kara sitiye shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye shakha niladharin danuwath kirime sammelanayakadi ya.
